description:
Professional solution for comparing and syncing data in databases 

dbForge Data Compare for MySQL is a software solution created to perform all kinds of jobs related to comparing and synchronizing data in MySQL and MariaDB databases. 

The tool focuses on checking the databases for discrepancies in data, reporting them in a visual interface, and letting the user sync the data to update one database with the contents of the other database. To sync the data, it generates specific scripts that users can apply or save for further cases. All routines can be automated and executed on schedule. 

Besides other tasks, it is a crucial part of an efficient DevOps process, and the Data Compare tool allows for automating it and ensuring its quality and safety. The tool is available as an individual solution or as a part of the data management Studio for MySQL.
summary: Professional solution for comparing and syncing data in MySQL and MariaDB databases
author: Devart
